welcome_message_body: Welcome to Toyota, Japan! Get ready to explore the city's rich history, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here.

restaurants.name: 松丈
restaurants.description: 松丈 is a deli located in 豊田市.

restaurants.name: 蕎麦 つちや
restaurants.description: 蕎麦 つちや is a soba restaurant located in 豊田市.
restaurants.address: 元城町2-8-1 (成田ビル 1F), 豊田市, 愛知県, 471-0024

restaurants.name: 神田町虎玄
restaurants.description: 神田町虎玄 is a ramen restaurant located in 豊田市.

restaurants.name: 廻鮮すし 魚魚丸 豊田十塚店
restaurants.description: 廻鮮すし 魚魚丸 豊田十塚店 is a sushi restaurant located in 豊田市.

restaurants.name: Katsuhiro (厚切りとんかつ手づくりおばんざい かつひろ)
restaurants.description: Katsuhiro (厚切りとんかつ手づくりおばんざい かつひろ) is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 豊田市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network throughout the airport.
